MMWave_LinkCRCCfg_t Struct Reference
mmWave API » mmWave External Data Structures

mmWave Link CRC configuration More...

#include <control/mmwave/mmwave.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t useCRCDriver
 Flag which if set is used to indicate that the CRC driver is to be used to perform the CRC computation.
 
CRC_Channel crcChannel
 The field is valid only if the CRC Driver is being used else this is ignored.
 

Detailed Description

mmWave Link CRC configuration

The structure is used to describe the CRC configuration. The mmWaveLink messages exchanged between the MSS/DSS and BSS have a checksum applied. The configuration determines if the checksum computation is to use the CRC Driver OR should the computation be done in the software.
